DOC.detailed_description: This single-arm , open-label , 8-week `` proof concept '' pilot study 20 subject determine detectable lipid-lowering effect oyster mushroom patient HIV hyperlipidemia take Kaletra ( ritonavir-containing HAART regimen ) . The study also assess whether concurrent administration oyster mushroom regimens safe , investigate mechanism action whereby oyster mushroom may exert antihyperlipidemic effect .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Documented HIV infection ( positive ELISA Western Blot measurable plasma HIV RNA ) . Taking Kaletra ( ritonavir/lopinavir ) , ritonavircontaining antiretroviral therapy , least 12 week Elevated nonHDL cholesterol > = 160 mg/dl define National Cholesterol Education Program guideline ( within 30 day enrollment ) AST ALT < 2.5 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) within 30 day study entry .
